scripts.ios-bundle: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output iOS/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.android-bundle: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android-release: npm run android-bundle && npm run android -- --variant=release
scripts.android-apk: npm run android-bundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
